attributes.action: consider seriously the derisory increase in pansion now being paid to over 80s.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The five shilling increase in pension, at the age of 80, has not been increased since its conception in the 1940's. If kept in line with inflation it would substantialy improve the quality of life for people over 80.  The 25 pence currently paid is an insult
